title: A Civilised malady
creator_credit: John Sexton and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: An investigation of the causes, incidence, social impact and cures of one of modern civilisations most insidious diseases, high blood pressure. Common salt is suspected of being the prime cause of this disease. In Australia one in six adults suffer from hypertension, but only half of those affected know that they have it.
